content: this pattern was created for progressing through a learn to knit course and for beginners wanting to try something simple it explores basic patterns and textures using combinations of knit and purl stitches to create eye-catching coasters for your cups and mugs cheers language english / us terms skill level beginner to experienced beginner sizes one size yarn malabrigo rios or worsted weight yarn needle us 8 / 5 0mm straight or 24 circular needle follow me @the_celestialknitter #decomugrugs #celestialknits #celestialknitter
